data.name: Read time for my text
data.description:
For this exercise you will have to implement the following algorithm in order to estimate the reading time of an article:

1. Find your total word count.
2. Divide your total word count by 200
3. The first part of your previous decimal number is your minute
4. Take the second part — the decimal points — and multiply that by 0.60. Keep only the first two decimals and those are your seconds.
5. print the output in the format `Time to read: n minutes and m seconds`


Example
---

input: `"Convert words into minutes here, some decimals into seconds there, a little rounding at the end… and you can calculate estimated time to read manually"`

1. word count: 25
2. 0.125
3. minutes: 0
4. seconds: 7
5. "Time to read: 0 minutes and 7 seconds"

output:

> "Time to read: 0 minutes and 7 seconds"


Extra reading
---

https://marketingland.com/estimated-reading-times-increase-engagement-79830
